item.title: Agronomist - Southern Africa
item.description: iSDA has developed Virtual Agronomist a digital advisor providing individually tailored expert advice for smallholders, which is powered by iSDAsoil: the first open-data farm-level soil map of Africa. Our primary customers are agribusinesses serving smallholder networks, we do not currently offer delivery direct to farmer. We have been testing our products and delivery channels in Uganda, Kenya, Tanzania and Cote dâ€™Ivoire during 2022, with plans to expand into Ghana, Nigeria and Southern Africa in 2023.
